intro: Calth High Guard (CCLVth COH) follow the Ultramar Doctrine, with an emphasis on large infantry formations. Its armies gain 13 formation points (F/p), 12 upgrade points (U/p), 3 Titan points (T/p), and 4 Ally points (A/p) for a normal sized battle. A negative U/p value means that you gain that many upgrade points for taking a particular formation.
strategy: Solar Auxilia armies have a Strategy Rating of 2.
Initiative: Legiones Astartes allied Detachments and Collegia Titanica allied Banners have an Initiative Rating of 1+. Calth High Guard Sections have an Initiative Rating of 2+, and are subject to the 'Army of Mankind' special rule. Questoris Familia Lances have an Initiative Rating of 2+ and are subject to the 'Chivalry' special rule. The Tarantula Battery have an Initiative Rating of 2+, and is subject to the 'Machine Spirit' special rule.

sections.name: Calth High Guard Core Sections
sections.description: Calth High Guard armies must contain one Section Command Tercio, and at least one Auxilia Lasrifle Tercio

formations.name: 1 Section Command Tercio
formations.units: One Auxilia Legate Marshal character in an Auxilia Command Squad, four Auxilia Lasrifle Squad, and one Auxilia Flamer Squad
extraUnits: Add two Auxilia Lasrifle Squads, two Auxilia Flamer Squads, or one Charonite Ogryns: 1 U/p
Add two Cyclops of any single configuration: 1 U/p
Add up to two Malcadors of any single configuration: 2 U/p each

formations.name: 1+ Auxilia Lasrifle Tercio
formations.units: One Auxilia Captain in an Auxilia Command Squad, four Auxilia Lasrifle Squads, one Auxilia Flamer Squad
extraUnits: Add two Auxilia Lasrifle Squads, two Auxilia Flamer Squads, or one Charonite Ogryns: 1 U/p
Add two Cyclops of any single configuration: 1 U/p
Add one Malcadors of any configuration: 2 U/p

formations.name: Veletaris Storm Section
extraUnits: Add two Auxilia Lasrifle Squads, two Auxilia Flamer Squads, or one Charonite Ogryns: 1 U/p

formations.name: Ogryn Charonite Section
extraUnits: Add two Auxilia Lasrifle Squads, two Auxilia Flamer Squads, or one Charonite Ogryns: 1 U/p

formations.name: Auxilia Rapier Battery
extraUnits: Add one Auxilia Adjutant character to one unit in the formation: 1 U/p

sections.name: Calth High Guard Special Sections
sections.description: May only have one Special Section for each two Core Sections

formations.name: Auxilia Heavy Sentinel Patrol
extraUnits: Add one Auxilia Adjutant character to one unit in the formation: 1 U/p

formations.name: Cybernetica Tarantula Battery
formations.units: Four Tarantula - Lascannon, and/or Tarantula - Hyperios

formations.name: Auxilia Leman Russ Squadron
formations.units: Three Leman Russ of any configuration
extraUnits: Add one Leman Russ of any configuration: 1 U/p

formations.name: Auxilia Artillery Battery
extraUnits: Add Basilisk and/or Medusa: 1 U/p

sections.name: Calth High Guard Elite Sections
sections.description: May only have one Elite Section for each three Core Sections

formations.name: Auxilia Malcador Squadron
formations.units: Two Malcadors of any single configuration

formations.name: Heavy Malcador Squadron
formations.units: Two Heavy Malcador Infernus, or two Heavy Malcador Valdor

formations.name: Super-Heavy Tank Squadron
formations.units: One Super-Heavy Tank of any configuration
extraUnits: Add one Super-Heavy Tank of any configuration: 3 U/p
Add one Auxilia Adjutant character to one unit in the formation: 1 U/p

formations.name: Auxilia Leman Russ Company
formations.units: Eight Leman Russ of any configuration
extraUnits: Add one Auxilia Adjutant character to one unit in the formation: 1 U/p

formations.name: Auxilia Artillery Company
extraUnits: Add one Auxilia Adjutant character to one unit in the formation: 1 U/p

sections.name: Imperial Navy Squadrons
sections.description: May only have one Navy Squadron for each three Core or Special Sections

formations.name: Thunderbolt Squadron
extraUnits: Add up to two Thunderbolt Fighters: 1 U/p each

sections.name: Calth High Guard Offboard Support Assets

formations.name: Warhound
extraUnits: Replace one Battle Weapon with a Support Weapon: 1 U/p

formations.name: Warhound Pack
formations.units: Two Warhound Scout Titans (must have the same armament)
extraUnits: Replace one Battle Weapon with a Support Weapon: 2 U/p

formations.name: Dire Wolf
formations.units: One Dire Wolf Heavy Scout Titan
extraUnits: Replace one Support Weapon with a Heavy Support Weapon (1 U/p)

formations.name: Reaver
extraUnits: Replace one Battle Weapon with a Support Weapon (1 U/p) or Heavy Support Weapon (2 U/p).

formations.name: Warlord
extraUnits: Replace one Battle Weapon with a Support Weapon (1 U/p) or Heavy Support Weapon (2 U/p).

formations.name: Warmaster
extraUnits: Replace two Battle Weapons with two Support Weapons of the same type (1 U/p)

sections.name: Legiones Astartes Allied Detachments
sections.description: The first formation selected must be a Tactical Detachment

formations.name: Tactical Detachment
formations.units: One Lieutenant character, four Tactical Legionaries
extraUnits: Replace the Lieutenant character with a Captain, Chaplain, or Librarian: 1 U/p
Replace up to two Legion Tactical Squads with two Legion Support Squads (1 U/p), two Legion Heavy Support Squads (2 U/p), or two Contemptor Dreadnoughts of any single configuration (2 U/p)

formations.name: Land Speeder Detachment
formations.units: Three Proteus Land Speeders or Javelin Attack Speeders of any configuration
extraUnits: Add one Proteus Land Speeder or Javelin Attack Speeder of any configuration: 1 U/p

formations.name: Questoris Lance
formations.units: Two Questoris Knight-Paladins, Crusaders, Errants, Wardens or Gallants. May not mix configurations
extraUnits: Add one Questoris Rocket Pod to each Knight in the formation: 1 U/p
